function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Filter surface adhesion of particles reducing enzyme filter performance","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in removing microbes, increasing risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of the filter surface to prevent particle adhesion","Technologies":"Advanced filtration materials and coatings to prevent particle adhesion","People":"Occupants of buildings with contaminated air","Owner":"Building maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Variable susceptibility of pathogens to UVGI based on cell wall presence and thickness","Impact":"Unequal effectiveness in inactivating different types of pathogens, leading to potential disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and testing of UVGI effectiveness on various pathogens","Technologies":"Advanced UVGI systems with adjustable intensity and exposure duration","People":"Public health officials, building managers","Owner":"Public health authorities, building management companies"},{"Description":"Impact of relative humidity on UVGI efficiency","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of UVGI in humid environments, increasing risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Controlled humidity levels in indoor environments, especially in areas with UVGI systems","Technologies":"HVAC systems with humidity control, humidity monitoring sensors","People":"Occupants of buildings with UVGI systems","Owner":"Building management companies"}]}
